text: Hanging Out Yonkers is an unfinished 1973 Belgian-American documentary movie by Chantal Akerman. The movie was shot at the request of a welfare organisation. It follows a rehabilitation program of juvenile delinquents. Akerman recorded many hours of interviews.Spaas, Lieve. Francophone Film: A Struggle for Identity. Manchester University Press, 2000, p26, ==References== == External links == * Category:Films directed by Chantal Akerman Category:1970s unfinished films Category:Belgian films
title: Hanging Out Yonkers
